entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
